  n) IMO -POLY requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit 
passes at not more than two (2) sittings which 
must include English Language, Mathematics 
and Economics or Geography,  
Physics/Chemistry and any of the following:  
Technical Drawing, Financial Accounting, 
Biology/Agricultural Science. Does not accept Art 
as a UTME subject, but require ‘O’ level credit 
pass in English Language  
o) OKE-OGUN POLY and KAZAURE require ‘O’ 
level credit pass in Economics.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
a)  KAD -POLY accepts Mathematics, Economics and 
any one (1) from Physics, Chemistry, 
Biology/Agricultural Science, Geography, 
Commerce, Financial Accounting, Technical 
Drawing or Fine Art.  
   b)  OKE-OGUN POLY requires Economics.  
   c)  AKPOLY accepts Mathematics, Economics and 
any other subjects.  
   d)  IMT-ENU accepts Biology/Agricultural Science.  
   e)  FEDPO-NAS requires Mathematics and any two  
(2) of Economics/Commerce, Geography/ 
Agricultural Science, Arts, Physics, Chemistry or 
Biology as UTME subjects.  
   f)  FEDPO-DAM accepts Geography

YABATECH offers the course as Fashion Design 
and requires ‘O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Fine Art or Clothing and Textile or 
Home Economics and any two (2)  subjects from 
the following History, Geography, Biology, Health 
Science, Technical Dr awing, Economics, 
Mathematics and Chemistry.  
KAD-POLY requires ‘O’ level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics and any three 
(3) from Home Economics, Technical Drawing, 
Fine Art, Clothing & textiles, History, Physics, 
Chemistry, Biology/Agricultu ral Science, 
Literature in English and Home Management.
